premise_source_doc_sentence: The Beverly Hills Cop and Top Gun projects afforded him two Grammy Awards : the first in 1986 for Best Album of original score written for a motion picture or television special , as a co-writer of the Beverly Hills Cop soundtrack ; and the second in 1987 for Best Pop Instrumental Performance with guitarist Steve Stevens for Top Gun Anthem from the Top Gun soundtrack .
